;----BASE NETWORKS----

;--ORTHOGONAL ROAD SIZE 1 (0x5C500000) - pass! --
0x5C500000,1,0,0x00AA0100,1,0=0x5C500000,1,0,0x00004B00,1,0
;;0x5C500000,1,1,0x00AA0100,1,1=0x5C500000,1,1,0x00004B00,1,1
;
;--ORTHOGONAL ROAD SIZE 2 (0x5C500080) - pass! --
